casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Steven Anthony MITCHELL, Appellant. WD 80088 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: March 27, 2018 Katharine Curry, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Robert Bartholomew, Jr., Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Victor C. Howard, and Karen King Mitchell, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Stephen Anthony Mitchell appeals a Johnson County Circuit Court conviction by a jury of receiving stolen property. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
